feed.title: Wishlist Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.38.0
entry.content:
New Features

Lists can now be customized! Properties like the list name, icon, and background color can be customized per list. In an upcoming release, the ability to create multiple lists will be added.

Other Changes

  • add polish language by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/209
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/210
  • replace url if its the same as the image by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/211

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.37.3...v0.38.0

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.39.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow inviting users via links when smtp enabled by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/229
  • Fix password reset form by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/232
  • Add basic bookmarklet support by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/230

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.38.3...v0.39.0
